Events.Text: Say hallo to the AI Assistant. [instruction 1 of 6]
Hello. I would like to view an apartment at North Hill on Thursday at 7 pm. My name is John.
Has an application
Did you pay an application fee?
I don't remember
You suddenly remember that you have a friend's wedding on Thursday at 7 pm. [instruction 2 of 6]

Events.Text: I am sorry, but there is no viewing available at your preferred time.

Events.Text: What day would you like to make the booking for?
Are these nice apartments?

You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee. Find a way to make an appointment anyway. If no date is available, change date and/or time until something works. If you already got the appointment, engage in smalltalk. [instruction 4 of 6]

Scenario.UserTask: You are interested in viewing an apartment. Please schedule a viewing at North Hill Apartments for Thursday at 7 pm. Your name is John. You cannot remember if you had payed the application fee.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user schedule an apartment viewing.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
